room_title: Escape room "Ghost Hunters" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
review: My friends and I did the Haunted Hospital aka Ghost Hunters. Words cant describe how much fun we had! The rooms were well thought out and properly executed with great props, sound effects and visuals. Top escape room company yet!

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Hunters" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
review: Our group of 6 really enjoyed ourselves. We tried the Ghost Hunters room and were able to escape in the last couple of seconds! We will definitely be back soon on our next time in town.

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Hunters" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
review: Had an awesome time here! We came to do a birthday party and chose the Ghost Hunters room. We escaped and the boys had so much fun playing video games! The owner was GREAT! Can't say enough positive things about him.
